title: Trump Gold Card - $1 Million Fast-Track Citizenship Program
summary: December 10, 2025: Trump administration launched 'Trump Gold Card' - pay $1 million for fast-track path to U.S. residency and citizenship. Official federal website TrumpCard.gov with Trump personal branding. Requires $15,000 nonrefundable DHS processing fee plus $1 million 'gift' upon vetting completion. Also offers 'Trump Corporate Gold Card' ($2M per employee) and announced future 'Trump Platinum Card' ($5M). Program allows wealthy immigrants to essentially buy citizenship while carrying Trump's name and likeness on official federal immigration documents.
keyFacts: Launched December 10, 2025 at official federal website TrumpCard.gov
Fast-track to residency and citizenship for $1 million
$1 million 'gift' to government upon completion of vetting
Qualifies applicants for EB-1 and EB-2 visa categories
Trump Corporate Gold Card: $15,000 fee + $2 million per employee
Future 'Trump Platinum Card' announced: $15,000 fee + $5 million contribution
Platinum Card allows 270 days in U.S. without U.S. taxes on non-U.S. income
Trump's name and branding on official DHS/federal immigration program
Experts questioned whether wealthy immigrants would pay premium
Critics noted selling citizenship for money with Trump's personal branding
